name: Powerless (itch) (Moonlight Studios)
description: The world was all but destroyed after the walking sickness wrought havoc on mankind.  You managed to stave off the worst of the outbreak by quarantining yourself and are now on a mission to purge those infected by the disease.  Do you have what it takes to overcome the zombie horde, or will you, too, succumb to it and take solace in the sweet release of death?
